column3: To improve comparability, certain classification changes have been made to fiscal 2016 for the quarterly periods ended November 30, 2015, February 29, 2016, and May 31, 2016 and to fiscal 2015 for the quarterly periods ended February 29, 2015, May 31, 2015, and August 31, 2015 to Sales, Cost of sales and Selling, general and administrative expenses. This change has no impact on Operating Income.
Earnings in foreign equity method investments are translated at their respective average exchange rates.
